channel.description: Recent content in Ai on dotNetting

item.title: The Human On the Loop: A Practical Guide to Agentic Engineering
item.description: The human IN the loop is a bottleneck. The human ON the loop is a multiplier. A practical guide on how to unblock agents without compromising on software quality. Agentic Loops (aka Ralph Loops) explained from First Principles with tips from personal experience.
